tool_description: Validates vendor tax documentation, verifies tax ID numbers, checks compliance status with tax authorities, and identifies required tax forms.

business_entity_type.description: Business entity type for tax purposes

error_messages: Invalid tax ID format: Tax ID must match the format required for the specified jurisdiction.
Tax jurisdiction not supported: Use one of [US_federal, state_specific, international].

Missing required tax forms: Vendor must provide additional tax documentation for compliance.
usage: Provide vendor_id, tax_id, tax_jurisdiction, and business_entity_type to verify tax compliance status and identify any missing requirements.

tax_id_valid.description: Whether the tax ID is valid
